item.description:
The Wadsworth Atheneum is showing the film "Incognito" following the Phoenix After Hours Party on Nov. 5, 2009. This month's cocktail party offers free Heineken to the first 300 party goers. The movie is free with paid admission to the After Hours Party. The Party runs 5:00-8:00 pm.

A skilled art forger, hired to recreate a Rembrandt, is double crossed by his partners and accused of murder.

The film is from 1997 and is directed by John Badham (Saturday Night Fever).
item.how_to_find_us: Well, no more ponytail, so glasses and a smile ( oh yes red hair)

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Art Movie in a Art House
